name: My Failed Delta Economy Class Review
description:
The plan was to review my economy class flight with Delta from Seattle to Las Vegas and it was all going so well right up to the moment of boarding.

My boarding pass didn't scan properly.  We tried again but it was clear this one was a dud. Instead I was issued a new one with the words we all love to hear - You've been Upgraded!

And with that went my economy class flight review. 

So now I present to you Delta's domestic first class instead. 

Sit, relax and enjoy the ride!

cheers

Dennis

Link for Jeb Brooks Denver Airport Operations Video:  https://youtu.be/pgTstGlM9x0

#delta #fligthreview

00:34 Security
